title: Uniworld 3D Environment
desc: A 3D virtual space for university events such as lectures, conferences, and showcases. Key features include networked real-time avatars, embedded presentation slides, dynamic 360-degree photo and video backgrounds, and a web editor tool for creating virtual rooms in the environment.

title: React-edit-text
desc: An open-source project that provides a lightweight editable text component for React with over 1200 weekly downloads on NPM and used by 170+ on Github.

title: Job Trackify
desc: A platform for managing and organising job applications, notes, and interview processes in an interactive Kanban board.

title: Coding Academy Online Platform
desc: A cross-platform application that allows coding instructors to remotely teach students from various academies in Seoul through real-time screen sharing, remote desktop control, and voice chat.

title: UCL Korean Society Forum
desc: A website for society members and guests to view upcoming events and announcements for the UCL Korean Society. Also a content management system with RBAC, built from scratch.

title: E-Commerce Platform
desc: Personal project to build a fully functional e-commerce platform from scratch, integrated payments with Stripe API.

title: Maplace Pre-order Landing Page
desc: Landing page for attracting investors to pre-order products, integrated with Paypal API

title: Health Care App (NHS)
desc: A hybrid mobile app (IOS, Android) for managing digital care plans, viewing and booking appointments, accessing various healthcare information, and reminders to take medicine.

title: 2D Helicopter Game
desc: A 2D platform game with controls integrated with an Engduino (modified variant of an Arduino) device.
